name: Baldi's Fun New School Remastered 1.0
description:
Welcome To Baldi's Fun New School Remastered! You Can Try The Browser Version By Clicking The Image Above! (Note: The Browser/WebGL Version Is Not Supported On Mobile Devices)

Baldi's Fun New School Remastered is the remastered version of the original Baldi's Fun New School mod. If you haven't played that mod yet, I recommend you play it first. Baldi's Fun New School Remastered has a total of 8 modes, which are:

  • Exploration Mode: Explore Around Without Baldi Chasing You!
  • Story Mode: Get All 7 Notebooks And Escape To Win!
  • Endless Mode: Try Collecting As Many Notebooks As Possible Before Baldi Gets You!
  • Timed Mode: Collect All The Notebooks And Escape In A Limited Amount Of Time!
  • Upside Down Mode: Get All The Notebooks And Escape While Everything's Upside Down!
  • Camping Mode: Go Camping With Baldi And Keep The Fires Going!
  • Bossfight Mode: The Spinner Boss Has Returned For Round 2! Try And Defeat Him!
  • And Discussion Area: Chat And Have Discussions With Other Players Online!

There's also secrets that can be found, like codes and hidden areas. Some of the codes return from Baldi's Fun New School, while others are entirely new and cause interesting things to happen. The endings from the original mod have also been completed changed as well.

Controls (PC)

W, A, S, D - Move Around | Mouse - Look Around | Shift - Run | Right Click - Interact With Objects | Left Click - Use Items | Escape/P - Pause Game (In Exploration, Story, Endless, Timed, And Upside Down Modes) | Q - Quit Level (In Camping, Bossfight, And Discussion Area Modes) | Tab - Toggle Chat Feed (In Discussion Area Mode)
